ca.keefer.sanemethod.Environment
Class ParticleLayer

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Environment.ParticleLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Layer
public class ParticleLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Layer

Particle Layer implements the Layer interface, for the sake of being rendered, updated and translated in time with the other display layers.

Author:
Christopher Keefer
